ComicInfo.Summary:
With a giant bloodthirsty supernatural wolf wreaking havoc across the countryside, The Duke and his strange new friends search for answers where the first victim died-inside the dangerous tunnels of the abandoned mine! But what they find there will cast a dark shadow over one of their own...
An amazing new adventure from Aaron Mahnke, the creator of the award-winning Lore podcast!
Co-written with New York Times Bestselling author Delilah S. Dawson (Star Wars: Phasma, Star Pig, Tales of Pell).
Don't miss the Robert Hack variant cover!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Piotr Kowalski (a) & Brad Simpson (c) | 1-2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Robert Hack | 3 |
